== Our Goal ==

Our duty as a Local Community team is to spread awareness about Ubuntu. We can assist you with any technical problems you may be facing and we will be happy to answer your queries. Please join the Ubuntu mailing list! 
IRC channel for Ubuntu West Bengal - #ubuntu-wb
